1: וַיְשִׁבֵנִי֮ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Afterward he brought me again</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> פֶּ֣תַח <sup>6607 </sup> <n>unto the door</n> הַבַּיִת֒ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and behold waters</n> יֹצְאִ֗ים <sup>3318 </sup> <n>issued out</n> מִתַּ֨חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> מִפְתַּ֤ן <sup>4670 </sup> <n>from under the threshold</n> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> קָדִ֔ימָה <sup>6921 </sup> <n>eastward</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> פְנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>for the forefront</n> הַבַּ֖יִת <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> קָדִ֑ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>[stood toward] the east</n> וְהַמַּ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>and the waters</n> יֹרְדִ֗ים <sup>3381 </sup> <n>came down</n> מִתַּ֜חַת <sup>8478 </sup> <n>under</n> מִכֶּ֤תֶף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>side</n> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of the house</n> הַיְמָנִ֔ית <sup>3233 </sup> <n>from under from the right</n> מִנֶּ֖גֶב <sup>5045 </sup> <n>at the south</n> לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>[side] of the altar</n>
2: וַיּוֹצִאֵנִי֮ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>Then brought he me out</n> דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>of the way</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>of the gate</n> צָפוֹנָה֒ <sup>6828 </sup> <n>northward</n> וַיְסִבֵּ֙נִי֙ <sup>5437 </sup> <n>and led me about</n> דֶּ֣רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>the way</n> ח֔וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>without unto the utter</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> שַׁ֣עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>gate</n> הַח֔וּץ <sup>2351 </sup> <n>to the outer</n> דֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>by the way</n> הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <sup>6437 </sup> <n>that looketh</n> קָדִ֑ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>eastward</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and behold</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> מְפַכִּ֔ים <sup>6349 </sup> <n>unstable</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הַכָּתֵ֖ף <sup>3802 </sup> <n>side</n> הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <sup>3233 </sup> <n>on the right</n>
3: בְּצֵאת־ <sup>3318 </sup> <n>went forth</n> הָאִ֥ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>And when the man</n> קָדִ֖ים <sup>6921 </sup> <n>eastward</n> וְקָ֣ו <sup>6957 </sup> <n>that had the line</n> בְּיָד֑וֹ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>in his hand</n> וַיָּ֤מָד <sup>4058 </sup> <n>he measured</n> אֶ֙לֶף֙ <sup>505 </sup> <n>a thousand</n> בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <sup>520 </sup> <n>cubits</n> וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <sup>5674 </sup> <n>and he brought me through</n> בַמַּ֖יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>the waters</n> מֵ֥י <sup>4325 </sup> <n>the waters</n> אָפְסָֽיִם׃ <sup>657 </sup> <n>[were] to the ankles</n>

7: בְּשׁוּבֵ֕נִי <sup>7725 </sup> <n>Now when I had returned</n> וְהִנֵּה֙ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> שְׂפַ֣ת <sup>8193 </sup> <n>behold at the bank</n> הַנַּ֔חַל <sup>5158 </sup> <n>of the river</n> עֵ֖ץ <sup>6086 </sup> <n>trees</n> רַ֣ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>many</n> מְאֹ֑ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>[were] very</n> מִזֶּ֖ה <sup>2088 </sup> <n>the one</n> וּמִזֶּֽה׃ <sup>2088 </sup> <n>side</n>
